# Subject

Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values.

```typescript
class Subject<T>
```

## Methods

| Method                              | Description                             |
| ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| [next](./Subject.next.md)           | Sends a value to all Subject observers. |
| [subscribe](./Subject.subscribe.md) | Subscribes to subject updates.          |
